text: You cannot downgrade MediationZone to an older version after having followed the Standard Upgrade Procedure , but you can perform a rollback to the previous version as described in Rollback for Standard Upgrades . However, if you have followed the Simplified Upgrade Procedure , you can perform a downgrade as described in Simplified Downgrade Procedure . This section has the following subsections: Rollback for Standard Upgrades Simplified Downgrade Procedure
title: Downgrade/Rollback - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
